<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: for(Iterator<Object> it = polygon.iterator(); it.hasNext(); ){
if(it.next() instanceof Vertex){
    // handle vertices
}else if(it.next() instanceof Edge){
    // handle edges
}
}
<<<explanation>>>: You can use the Iterator.next() method to check the type of the next element in the iterator and handle it accordingly. In this case, you can check if the next element is a Vertex or Edge and handle them accordingly.
